title: Facebook Mom

fields.name: If used by Facebook Mom and at least one other player, on the same target:
fields.value:
Your target will be hit by an astral attack with attack score equal to (0.3^n)x the average score of all players using this ability, where n = the number of players using the ability. For example, 3 players with the same target would result in a 2.7x attack power, multipled by the average score.

***Prayer Vigil** (Passive)*
If you die, you and all Prayer Warriors will instantly use their ability on your attacker. They will be notified "You successfully prayed for (your username)" rather than completing their action. Note: If you are lynched, you may instead choose the target of this action.
